metadata.title: CVE-2020-8559 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The Kubernetes kube-apiserver in versions v1.6-v1.15, and versions prior tov1.16.13, v1.17.9 and v1.18.6 are vulnerable to an unvalidated redirect onproxied upgrade requests that could allow an attacker to escalateprivileges from a node compromise to a full cluster compromise.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
